Return Standardized Estimates to the Original Scale

Source: R/RcppExports.R
OrigScale.Rd

Return Standardized Estimates to the Original Scale

Usage

OrigScale(coef_std, sd_Y, sd_X, mean_Y, mean_X)

Arguments

coef_std

Numeric matrix. Standardized estimates of the autoregression and cross regression coefficients.

sd_Y

Numeric vector. Standard deviations of the Y matrix.

sd_X

Numeric vector. Standard deviations of the X matrix.

mean_Y

Numeric vector. Means of the Y matrix.

mean_X

Numeric vector. Means of the X matrix.

Author

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

Examples

coef_std <- FitVAROLS(Y = StdMat(VAR_YX$Y), X = StdMat(VAR_YX$X[, -1]))
sd_Y <- sqrt(diag(var(VAR_YX$Y)))
sd_X <- sqrt(diag(var(VAR_YX$X[, -1])))
mean_Y <- colMeans(VAR_YX$Y)
mean_X <- colMeans(VAR_YX$X[, -1])
OrigScale(coef_std = coef_std, sd_Y = sd_Y, sd_X = sd_X, mean_Y = mean_Y, mean_X = mean_X)
#>           [,1]      [,2]     [,3]      [,4]      [,5]     [,6]
#> [1,]  1.605046  1.931976 1.547040  1.850015  1.881862 2.169773
#> [2,]  3.418832  2.257571 3.688510  3.447211  2.858299 3.152791
#> [3,] 10.422703 10.402993 4.698432 10.421984 10.428670 7.629989
FitVAROLS(Y = VAR_YX$Y, X = VAR_YX$X[, -1])
#>              [,1]       [,2]       [,3]         [,4]       [,5]       [,6]
#> [1,]  0.387920808 0.03231299 0.04869624  0.136574680 0.04612981 0.01316764
#> [2,]  0.038101548 0.51204958 0.01610152 -0.002875789 0.26175258 0.04930620
#> [3,] -0.003827389 0.04704638 0.64303935  0.015204624 0.02304969 0.32942855
